description: System-generated unique identifier for this contact address record.
Reference to the contact (person or organization) this address belongs to.
Code indicating type of address (e.g., home, work, billing); values likely map to a lookup; confirm meanings.
Flag indicating whether this is the primary address for the contact.
Primary street address line.
Secondary street address line (apartment, suite, building).
Additional address line for complex locations; often null.
City for the address.
County or district for the address; optional.
Reference or code for the state/province; likely a lookup to a state table.
Postal code for the address.
Reference or code for the country; likely a lookup.
Main telephone number for voice calls; free-form, may include extensions or notes.
Mobile/cell phone number; free-form text.
Pager or alternate contact number; legacy field; may include notes.
Fax number; field may contain legacy notes or other text; confirm usage.
Additional telephone number for the contact.
Label describing the additional phone number (e.g., Home, Spouse).
Primary email address for the contact.
Email address used for mobile messaging devices or SMS gateways.
Indicator that wireless email is enabled for the contact; likely boolean (0/1); confirm values.
Website URL associated with the contact or organization.
System timestamp when the address record was last updated.
Addressee or attention line to display for this address; may override the contactâ€™s name.
Job title or role of the contact person.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record (audit field); naming suggests an ID but values appear datetime; confirm.
Identifier of the user who created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp when this record was last modified by a user.
